testimonials.name: Johnny

On the day itself, we started well-prepared. Most things went as expected, but there were surprises too â€” like the fake bear incident, which was both scary and funny! Finishing together with teammates felt amazing. Every time we reached an aid station and saw friends with food, drinks, and chairs ready for us, it was heartwarming. 54km sounds long, but looking back, it flew by and wasn't as hard as I thought. Perfect for anyone interested but worried they can't finish â€” challenge yourself!
